items.title: How Elon Musk is rewriting the rules on founder power
items.creator: Theresa Loconsolo
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: How Elon Musk is rewriting the rules on founder power
items.content: Elon Musk has merged SpaceX and xAI, creating what might be the blueprint for a new Silicon Valley power structure. With his $800 billion net worth already rivaling historic conglomerate GE’s peak market cap, and Musk being vocal about his view that “tech victory is decided by velocity of innovation,” the question isn’t whether a personal conglomerate can be built, but rather how far Musk himself is […]
